amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection of Persons and Property
amendatorysection.para: Venue for any proceeding under the Uniform Community Property Disposition at Death Act is in the county in this state where:
(1) The decedent was domiciled at the time of death; or
(2) The decedent's property was located at the time of death if the decedent was not domiciled in Nebraska at the time of death.
